SEARCH
Package model

Class ScoreBoard

java.lang.Object
model.ScoreBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Iterable<Score>
public class ScoreBoard extends Object implements Serializable, Iterable<Score>
Class to construct a serializable scoreboard Construct it by giving the `Game` object from which to build the scoreboard, and send it over network to the clients
See Also:
